notes_develop: This is the service category needed to roll up the information from Outclaims PRM into something that will compare with the benchmarks.

notes_develop: Service level risk factor used for utilization
notes_client: This is the service level risk adjustment factor applied to the published loosely or well managed benchmark utilization value. 1.0 values next to the well managed benchmarks because no risk adjustment was made.

notes_develop: Service level risk factor used for costs
notes_client: This is the service level risk adjustment factor applied to the published loosely or well managed benchmark cost value. 1.0 values next to the well managed benchmarks because no risk adjustment was made.
